content: slip 1st and 2nd stitch knitwise to rh needle pass 1st stitch over 2nd stitch =a slip 3rd stitch center stitch knitwise on rh now on lh pass 5th st over 4th stitch =b leaving b on left needle insert left needle tip into a at the back from left to right and slip a back to lh while picking up center stitch knitwise to rh knit a and b together and lift center stitch over stitch just worked 4 sts decreased sl1yo = work a yarn over followed by a slipped stitch by bringing the yarn forward between the needles slipping the stitch and bringing the yarn to the back over the needle slipped stitches and accompanying yarn over are treated as a single stitch in stitch counts sl2kp= slip two stitches as if to knit together knit one stitch pass the two slipped stitches over centre stitch in pattern color in top knitting directions the star is worked in the round from edge to center beginning with a knitted round work two color brioche pattern rounds in color indicated mc or cc do not break yarn between rounds simply drop the previous color leaving it in front and pick up the new one without crossing yarns if you are counting rounds count only the stitches going up on the knit column you have to work 4 rounds 2 with each color to count 2 rounds i recommend nancy marchant´s classes and wonderful books on brioche knitting her online class offers more information on the intriguing brioche technique using mc and 16 circular needle cast on 120 144 sts using the twisted german co method join in round being careful not to twist stitches round 1 mc * k10 sl2kp k11 * repeat 4 5 more times to end of round 10 12 sts decreased 110 132 sts remain rnd1 cc using cc yarn wyib *sl1yo p1* repeat to end of round being careful to keep the yarn over the first slipped stitch rnd2 mc *brk1 sl1yo * repeat to end of round drop mc yarn in front of work rnd2 cc *sl1yo brp1 * repeat to end of round drop cc yarn in front of work rnd3 mc * brk1 sl1yo 4 times br4stdec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo 4 times * repeat 4 5 more times to end of round 20 24 sts decreased 90 108 sts remain rnd3 cc *sl1yo brp1 * repeat rnd4 mc *brk1 sl1yo* repeat rnd4 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat switch to double pointed needles if necessary november mood 2 all rights reserved ©2016 katrinschubert rnd5 mc * brk1 sl1yo 3 times br4stdec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo 3 times * repeat 4 5 6 more times to end of round 20 24 sts decreased 70 84 sts remain rnd5 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat rnd6 mc *brk1 sl1yo* repeat rnd6 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat rnd7 mc * brk1 sl1yo 2 times br4stdec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo 2 times * repeat 4 5 6 more times to end of
